title: British Official Floats Abandoning Ancient Legal Tradition Enshrined By Magna Carta
description: 'Juries are not just part of our tradition'

title: British Official Floats Abandoning Ancient Legal Tradition Enshrined By Magna Carta
description: Justice Secretary David Lammy is pushing a sweeping overhaul of England's and Wales’ criminal courts that would strip thousands of defendants of their right to be tried by a jury.

title: Ancient creed still plays big role in Christian faiths
description: Centuries of church schisms show that if there’s a doctrine to be fought over, there’s a good chance Christians will fight about it.

title: Meet The Ancient Turtle That Outlived The Dinosaurs — And Is Still Laying Eggs Today
description: The leatherback sea turtle offers a rare look into prehistoric life and reveals how a lineage can survive mass extinctions, climate upheavals and 200 million years of evolutionary change.

title: Meet The Ancient Turtle That Outlived The Dinosaurs — And Is Still Laying Eggs Today - Forbes
